channel.title: The "OMG this game is on sale is it worth X bucks" Thread
channel.description:
It happens often enough.
Today it's Bioshock 2 for me: $4.99. Is it worth it? I liked the first one, but if the second one is [i]exactly[/i] the same, I don't know that I want to dish out five more bucks for it.

item.title: The "OMG this game is on sale is it worth X bucks" Thread
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
I actually prefer Crysis 2 to the first game. The story was better, the gameplay was more focused, the level design was more vertical to contrast the horizontal areas of the first game, and the vehicle sections were both not terrible and short so as to actually make them somewhat fun to play.

Read full topic
item.source: The "OMG this game is on sale is it worth X bucks" Thread

item.title: The "OMG this game is on sale is it worth X bucks" Thread
item.dc:creator: Vitriol
item.description:
Worth it IMO. Not as good as the first game, but nowhere near as bad as I had heard. I had fun with it.

Read full topic

item.title: The "OMG this game is on sale is it worth X bucks" Thread
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
I had actually been saying Crysis 2 was bad along with everyone else for a while but once I actually played it I think it is pretty fun. I’m not going to buy it right now but I would say it’s worth $9 :ninja: . It’ll push your gpu to the limit as well.

Read full topic

item.title: The "OMG this game is on sale is it worth X bucks" Thread
item.dc:creator: MDIGN
item.description:
sorry for the dubs but ULTIMATE NEWEGG SALE!
https://www.newegg.com/Store/SubCategory.aspx?SubCategory=372&name=PC-Games&Page=1&Order=PRICE

Fallout New Vegas for only $5.99 that’s right only $5.99[/SIZE]
and if you act now, We’ll throw in Rage for an extra $5.99!

Sound too good to be true? Well why not pick up the big bad Brink while you’re at it for only $5.99!

If you’re looking for a few laughs and giggles then grab yourself a crappy of Square Enix’s latest failure and disgrace to the Final Fantasy series for only $14.99 with free shipping and handling.
FFXIII-2

We don’t want this garbage! One man’s trash is another man’s treasure right!?!? (But what is both men’s trash? these games)

*Certain restrictions may apply, and results may vary. Buy at your own risk.

Read full topic

item.title: The "OMG this game is on sale is it worth X bucks" Thread
item.dc:creator: MDIGN
item.description:
I don’t recall having any issues, but I’ll re-download it and check real quick.
EDIT: now I remember, I had the GOG version, it was on sale and is patched to work on modern PC’s. I believe the errors were because of x64-bit architecture, but I think it works on 32-bit OS’s just fine.

item.title: The "OMG this game is on sale is it worth X bucks" Thread
item.dc:creator: Katana
item.description:
acade365:

Haven’t played it, so I wouldn’t know.

Most people tend to agree that it gets a little boring at times and it has zero replayability value, but for 5 bucks, you can’t really complain.

It’s a pretty bad movie, especially when you control the main character (into performing tragically poor choices that it tries to convince you are yours)

Well, let’s see, Cole! Would you like to wrongfully convict a man based on incomplete evidence and sentence him to death, or wrongfully convict a man based on incomplete evidence and sentence him to death?

Amazon seems to be having some deals on their digital PC downloads:

https://www.amazon.com/gp/feature.html/ref=amb_link_363820582_2?ie=UTF8&docId=1000812791&pf_rd_m=ATVPDKIKX0DER&pf_rd_s=center-2&pf_rd_r=1VXHS3VRNPGYF9Z67N50&pf_rd_t=101&pf_rd_p=1375653922&pf_rd_i=979455011

Read full topic
